result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

defendant.name: Oberg, Jay Dale
defendant.address: N1566 County Road Vv, Hager City, WI 54014

records.addlTxt: 11:52 AM  Assistant District Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jay Dale Oberg in Court.  Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in Court for Jay Dale Oberg.  Court advises Defendant of charges and possible penalties.  Further reading waived.  Atty. Nelson enters NG pleas.  Bond continues.  Court questions Defendant's address and phone.  Adjourned at 11:54 AM

11:39 AM  Assistant District Attorney Joseph M. Schieffer in Court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jay Dale Oberg in Court.  Attorney Liesl E. Nelson in Court for Jay Dale Oberg.  Includes Preliminary Hearing on 22CF89 and Status on 22CT40.  S/T Pierce County Deputy Rick Huenke.  Direct by ADA Schieffer.  Defendant identified.  Cross by Atty. Nelson.  Officer released.  State makes argument, requests probable cause finding and bind over.  Atty. Nelson decline argument for today's purposes.  Court makes findings; finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for further proceedings.
Status conference scheduled for November 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on November 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.

4:04 PM Jay Dale Oberg appears via zoom,  Atty Liesl E. Nelson appears via zoom, ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF89 (PH) and 22CT40 (STC). ADA Walker is requesting a PH, Atty Nelson is in agreement. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 4:08 pm.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Preliminary hearing on October 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Document 17 erased. It was copied from 22CT40. New response/reply being scanned.
from Ct Comm Gavic to SPD letter " Request dated 09/08 submitted by the PD's office is granted. Atty. Nelson is to contact both the court and DA to re-schedule the Prelim and Stat. Conf. JRG"
from SDP office  requesting to reschedule the preliminary hearing with Atty Nelson's calendar
filed by Atty Nelson
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Liesl Nelson

10:54 AM  Defendant Jay Dale Oberg in Court.  ADA Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CT40 & 22CF89.  ADA Walker advises Defendant contacted her office this morning re: warrants.  State moves to quash warrants and reinstate bonds.  Qualifies for PD but attorney has not been assigned.  Court quashes warrants and reinstates bond.  Adjourned at 10:57 AM
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 12, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

4:10 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg not in court.  Attorney Kaley Walker in court for State of Wisconsin.  22CF89 and 22CT40 heard at this time; Court: defendant was allowed to appear via phone if he retained counsel. ADA Walker requests a statewide warrant on 22CT40 and adjoining states on 22CF89. Court authorizes warrants as requested. 4:12

3:59 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg appears in Court,  ADA Kaley Walker for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF89 and 22CT40 (STC). DE states he will be retaining counsel tomorrow. ADA Walker would like to set another STC. DE may appear by phone for the next hearing if he has counsel. Court adjourned at 4:05 pm
Status conference scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on August 16, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on July 28, 2022 at 04:00 pm.

2:31 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg appears in Court,  ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CF89 and 22CT40 (STC). DE was filling a PFAC but was laid off and now is back at work. ADA Walker cannot make an offer until the DE has counsel if wanted and a PH. DE will complete the PFAC. ADA Walker is requesting a STC.  Court adjourned at 2:38 pm.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Status conference on July 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

2:58 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg appears in Court, DA Halle E. Hatch appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CT40 and 22CF89 (RW). Court questions non-appearance, Def responds. Court will QUASH the WARRANTS and reinstate the bond. DE will complete a PFAC today. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:02 pm.  Status conference scheduled for July 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:20 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg does not appear in Court, ADA Kaley Walker appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Includes 22CT40, 22CF89, 22TR485 and 22TR539 (STC). Due to non-appearance the State is asking for warrants on 22CT40 and 22CF89 and Default TR's. Court will authorize warrant on 22CF89 adj. States and 22CT40 Statewide. Court will Default 22TR485 and 22TR539 with amounts on citations and 60 DTP. Court adjourned at 1:22 pm.
Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Court finds Defendant freely, intelligently, knowingly, and understandingly made and waives constitutional right to those time requirements.
records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
Defendant to maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Not to possess controlled substances without a valid prescription.
Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Def from PCJ

3:40 PM Defendant Jay Dale Oberg appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl E. Nelson, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. ADA Schieffer is requesting a $10,000.00 SIBS w/conditions of NTO, AS & no possession illegal drugs, no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number.  DE does not qualify for PD. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:47 pm  Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
